articles.description: Footage shows a massive calico cat taking a kip on a white ledge above a light switch with its paws tucked neatly under its chin. It is being displaced on a billboard at Shinjuku train station, Tokyo, Japan.
articles.content:
A giant 3D cat is amazing shoppers on a billboard in Tokyo, Japan.
Footage shows a massive calico cat taking a kip on a white ledge above a light switch. 
With its paws tucked neatly under its chin… [+1341 chars]

articles.content: Loki is leading up to something. And it's big. How big, you ask? Bigger than the nearly unbeatable gray cloud the characters faced in episode 5. If you hadn't heard the name Alioth before, you wouldn… [+2634 chars]
